sentences.en: Buying budget-priced furniture needn't mean compromising on quality or style.
sentences.cn: 买价钱经济的家具并不意味着就要牺牲质量和样式。

sentences.en: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agent from £240.
sentences.cn: 收费低廉的旅行社可以提供240英镑起的低价机票。

sentences.en: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.cn: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

sentences.en: Defence soaks up forty per cent of the budget.
sentences.cn: 国防耗去40%的预算。

sentences.en: Jordan promised to trim the city budget without cutting essential services.
sentences.cn: 乔丹承诺在不减少基本服务的前提下，缩减市政预算。

sentences.en: She has to work within the limits of a fairly tight budget.
sentences.cn: 她不得不在相当紧张的预算范围内精打细算。

sentences.en: Southwark council admitted making serious miscalculations in this year's budget.
sentences.cn: 南华克区的地方议会承认今年的预算出现严重的计算失误。

sentences.en: The 1981 budget was the springboard for an economic miracle.
sentences.cn: 1981年的预算促成了一场经济奇迹的出现。

sentences.en: The 1985 federal budget allocated $7.3 billion for development programmes.
sentences.cn: 1985年的联邦预算将73亿美元拨给了开发项目。

sentences.en: The change proposed last month was foreshadowed in the March Budget.
sentences.cn: 上个月提议的变动在3月份的预算中已经有所预兆了。

sentences.en: The decision is the strategic fulcrum of the Budget.
sentences.cn: 这一决定是预算案的战略支点。

sentences.en: The department has been shrinking year by year because of budget cuts.
sentences.cn: 这个部门因为预算削减而逐年萎缩。

sentences.en: The House of Representatives approved a new budget plan.
sentences.cn: 众议院批准了一项最新预算案。

sentences.en: There has been an underspend in the department's budget.
sentences.cn: 该部门的花费少于其预算。

sentences.en: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.cn: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.en: Twenty eight percent of the federal budget is spent on defense.
sentences.cn: 28%的联邦预算用于国防。

sentences.en: We had a really tight budget .
sentences.cn: 我们的预算很紧。

sentences.en: We had a really tight budget.
sentences.cn: 我们的预算很紧。

sentences.en: We were two months behind schedule, and already over budget.
sentences.cn: 我们的进度晚了两个月，而且已经超出了预算。

sentences.en: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.cn: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.en: we're travelling on a budget.
sentences.cn: 我们旅游时精打细算。

trans.tran_en: very low in price – often used in advertisements
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

trans.tran_cn: 谨慎花钱，把…编入预算，为…做出安排
trans.tran_en: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it
to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it
if you budget something such as time, you decide how much of it you will need
